text: khran meux sacthrrm cak rea di mayang phwk khea phwk khea klaw wa “thami khea (muhammad) cung midi rab yeiyng kab thi mu sa di rab lea?” K phwk khea midi ptiseth sing thi thuk prathan hı kæ mu sa ma kxn dxk hrux? Phwk khea klaw wa “thang sxng khux wethmntr thi snabsnun sung kanlæakan” læa wa “rea pen phu ptiseth thangsin”
